Description
ApplicationModule
The root TUIModule of an application.
ApplicationModule.Builder
Builder for ApplicationModule.
ConfirmationPrompt
Handles getting confirmation from the user.
ContainerModule
Not only does this class improve modularity by housing other modules, but it also provides a template for extending TUIGenericModule.
ContainerModule.Builder
Builder for ContainerModule

Required Fields: name
DirectedGraphNode<P,A,T>
Provides a mechanism for working with nodes in a directed graph.
DirectedGraphNode.PropertyUpdateFlag
Specifies behavior for updating a property of this node.
FunctionModule
Handles arbitrary logic execution for the application by executing a Supplier when the module is run.
FunctionModule.Builder
Builder for FunctionModule.
InputHandler
Handles management of the application state by running logic on saved inputs from the application.
InputHandler.HandlerType
Specifies how to build the handler.
IOCapture
 
ModuleFactory
Provides abstractions for common TUI patterns.
ModuleTemplate<B>
This class is an extension of TUIModule.Builder that provides a main field which will be accessible inside the class extending this.
NameOrModule
Stores either the module builder or the name of a module, which abstracts module retrieving.
NumberedList
Handles displaying a list of text as a numbered list.
NumberedModuleSelector
Handles navigating to a module based on a user's decision.
PasswordInput
Handles collecting, validating, and cleaning passwords from the user.
RunFrame
Holds information required for a single scheduling unit of the application.
RunFrame.State
Signals to the scheduler how to manage this frame.
TextChain
Simplifies chaining text together that is meant to live on the same line.
TextInputModule
Handles collection of text for the application.
TextInputModule.Builder
Builder for TextInputModule.
TextModule
Handles the displaying of text.
TextModule.Builder
Builder for TextInputModule.
TextModule.OutputType
Defines the behavior of the TextModule, specifically whether it displays raw text or fetches application state.
TUIModule
The abstract class for all TUIModules.
TUIModule.Builder<B>
Builder for TUIModule.
TUIModule.Property
Fields that can be recursively updated in the Builder.
